title: I need some stuff, and to begin with, a nice picture of Evert Bloemsma
content:
Fellow Typophiles,

As some of you may know, I am currently working on the layout of a typography book due to be released in France, Belgium, Switzerland and Canada at the end of september. I have a huge load of documents to include in it, but some things are still missing, so I might, once in a while, in the next few weeks post a request, asking for some of you to kindly provide me with what’s missing, if you happen to have these docs. As for now, I am desperately in need of a decent picture of Evert Bloemsma.

Any help appreciated, and aknowledged in the book of course.

Thanks,  
dr

 [‹ Degree classification...does it REALLY matter?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515232008/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44938 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pill Gothic OTF Small Caps won't work in InDesign CS3 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515232008/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45129 "Go to next forum topic")

comments.content:
Photographer [Marc Eckardt](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515232008/http:/www.fontblog.de/typohall-sprecher-portraits-von-marc-eckardt) took the following photo for TYPO 2004 where Evert was a speaker. I would contact him and ask for the rights to use it. We here at FontShop have a hi-res file if he doesn’t.
